item.title: After April Fools' Day
item.description: Yesterday, I announced my latest research topic on Twitter and Facebook: Software Patterns of User Experience for World of Warcraft (SPUXWoW). Introducing Software Patterns of User Experience for World of Warcraft (SPUXWoW). http://j.hng.tw/lpgnb — Ron Huang (@ronhuang) April 1, 2011 However, instead of pointing to the actual research page, the link pointed to RickRoll’D on YouTube. As of today, there are a total of 87 people who got rickroll’d by me.
